title: Uh help :')
body: Can someone tell me how I can join the PBE? The site doesn't work for me. Thanks.

replies.body: Are you getting a 500 error?  It's something we've been looking into and want to investigate further.   Grab a screenshot and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can gather more information.  We'll reply back asap!
